title: Challenges and Strategies for Improving Mathematical Proficiency in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: The primary challenge is adapting to non-real-time learning using personal devices while balancing work and study as a working professional

learning_goals: Learners can explain over three self-directed learning strategies for solving math problems in an online learning environment.
Learners can plan and execute over five hours of weekly math learning activities using an LMS system.
Learners will achieve over 80% math concept comprehension through peer interactions on online discussion boards.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
